fortitudecrystal.title: Fortitude Crystal
fortitudecrystal.data:
Roost and Reign (Maniac 2 Griffons) is the best quest for Fortitude Crystals.
Use a ranged character for best results.
fortitudecrystal.help: This gives the best quest for farming Fortitude Crystals.

terminusweapon.title: Terminus Weapon
terminusweapon.data:
Terminus Weapons only drop from `Tales of Bahamut's Rage`.
Complete `ALL` proud quests to unlock this.
20% Drop Rate for Unowned Weapons (Based on Unlocked Characters).
(Credits to Nenkai)
terminusweapon.help: This gives the drop rate for Terminus Weapons.

supplementarydamage.title: Supplementary Damage
supplementarydamage.data:
Supplementary Damage Sigils drop from Curios.
See the `Curios` command for more information.
supplementarydamage.help: This explains how to get Supplementary Damage Sigils.

warelemental.title: War Elemental
warelemental.data:

See the `Curios` command for more information.
warelemental.help: This explains how to get War Elemental Sigils.

curiodrops.title: Curio Drop Table
curiodrops.data:
Curios drop in different tiers (1-4).
Rare Sigils drop best from T4 Sigils.
If you have cleared `The Final Report` then group 5 curios will drop from all your quests.
Check the `Drops` command for a link to the Drop Rate of all Quests (Including Curios)
(Credits to Nenkai)
curiodrops.help: This gives a link to the Drop Rate Table for all Curios.

afk.help: This gives a link to the super soldiers character thread.

1.title: Safe Build.
1.notes:
This build is designed for survivability.
This is a generic catch all build, meant for most players.
All secondary sigils and wrighstone here are flexible.

2.title: Tap Setsuna DPS Build.
2.notes:
This is a tap setsuna build.
LOTL can be replaced with Glass Cannon.
You can replace 2x QCD for utility sigils but this is a massive damage loss.

3.title: Post Lucilius Build.
3.notes:
This is a `perfect` build with Supplementary V+.
`You must sacrifice utility sigils to run Alpha, Beta, or Gamma.`
You can choose to drop 2x Quick Cooldown for 1x Potion Hoarder and 1x Improved Dodge/Aegis.

1.title: Safe Build
1.notes:
This build is designed for survivability.
This only runs 2 Supplementary Damage sigils as the other damage sigils are more valuable.
Stout Heart is useful so you dont drop Ares.
Drain caps at 500 per hit so you only need a few levels on wrightstone.
(Credits to Noa)

2.title: DPS Build
2.notes:
This build is designed to maximize dps.
You can slot in QCD or more defensive sigils on your Supplementary V+ if you get them.
(Credits to Noa)

3.title: Firm Stance Build
3.notes:
This build is around Firm Stance.
You will drop Ares if you get pushed back by the boss, which you can avoid with lv 20 Firm Stance.
(Credits to Noa)

1.title: Safe Build
1.notes:
This build is designed for survivability.
This only runs 2 Supplementary Damage sigils as the other damage sigils are more valuable.
Stout Heart is useful.
Drain caps at 500 per hit so you only need a few levels on wrightstone.
(Credits to Aristocrat)

2.title: DPS Build
2.notes:
This build is designed to maximize dps.
`Crimson's Flight is optional.`
You can slot in QCD or more defensive sigils on your Supplementary V+ if you get them.
(Credits to Aristocrat)

3.title: Post Lucilius Build
3.notes:
The utility on Supplementary V+ are not required and can be swapped around with anything.
(Credits to Aristocrat)

1.title: Safe Build
1.notes:
This build is designed for survivability.
This relies on 20% Skill Damage OM to cap Pain Train.

2.title: DPS Build
2.notes:
This build is designed to maximize dps.
`QCD and Cascade are not needed`, you can replace them with utility sigils if you desire.
You can slot in more defensive sigils on your Supplementary V+ if you get them.

3.title: Post Lucilius Build
3.notes:
You can swap Beta with Alpha for a damage loss if you value 3% SBA gain.
The utility on Supplementary V+ are not required and can be swapped around with anything.

1.title: Safe Build
1.notes: This build is designed for survivability.

2.title: DPS Build
2.notes:
This build is designed to maximize dps.
`QCD and Cascade are not needed`, you can replace them with utility sigils if you desire.
You can slot in more defensive sigils on your Supplementary V+ if you get them.

3.title: Post Lucilius Build
3.notes: The utility on Supplementary V+ are not required and can be swapped around with anything.
